template.name: dynamic config product template style 1 grid

input.name: csrf_token
input.t-nocache: The csrf token must always be up to date.

div.t-attf-class: image_wrapper position-relative overflow-hidden #{'image_bg' if design_params['img_bg_color'] == 'on' else ''}

a.class: btn btn-link flat p-0 text-capitalize b2bloginbtn lpopen d-block d-md-inline-block text-decoration-none
btn btn-link b2bloginbtn flat p-0 text-capitalize d-block d-md-inline-block text-decoration-none
